original_title: Mama Mirabelle's Home Movies: Its Movie Time!
overview: When animated elephant Mama Mirabelle (voiced by Vanessa Williams) travels to a distant land with her movie camera, she returns with films of fascinating wildlife that she uses to teach her young friends about the natural world. Real-life preschoolers will find this eight-episode collection an absorbing and informative introduction to amazing creatures found in Africa, the Galapagos Islands, the ocean and more.
title: Mama Mirabelle's Home Movies: Its Movie Time!
